title: Cinnamon Lakeside Colombo’s ColomBar moves to newly refurbished location
body_lines: Colombo’s iconic and stylish destination bar, ColomBar, has been re-located to its original now revamped location to reinvigorate its offering of delightful cocktails, exclusive spirits, and fusion food and music that truly embody the spirit and diversity of the island. Conceptualised to showcase the city and the island’s vibrant culture and heritage in one place, ColomBar is now back at its original location, by the restaurants at Cinnamon Lakeside Colombo. Since its inception in 2019, ColomBar has attracted a loyal base of customers who visit with friends and colleagues to relax and unwind.

Colombar distinguishes itself from others by representing the essence of Colombo’s soul by offering an authentic experience unique from any other bar experience in the city. By showcasing unique local experiences, ColomBar is in turn putting on display the wonder that is Sri Lanka to its guests, priming their curiosity to learn more about the amazing island.

By celebrating Sri Lanka’s diversity and spirit through its enhanced offering, ColomBar is enhancing the city’s nightlife by extending one more reason for people to flock to the city. As the jewel in Colombo’s nightlife, ColomBar offers a true bucket-list encounter for locals and foreigners alike.
